definitions.definition: A slow graceful dance consisting of a coupé , a high step, and a balance .
A tune or air to regulate the movements of the minuet dance : it has the dance form, and is commonly in 3/4 , sometimes 3/8 , measure .
A complete short musical composition inspired by and conforming to many formal characteristics of the traditional musical accompaniment to the dance of same name.
A movement which is part of a longer musical composition such as a suite , sonata , or symphony which is inspired by and conforming to formal characteristics of the dance of same name.

main_definition: A slow graceful dance consisting of a coupé , a high step, and a balance .
secondary_definitions: ( music ) A tune or air to regulate the movements of the minuet dance : it has the dance form, and is commonly in 3/4 , sometimes 3/8 , measure .
( music ) A complete short musical composition inspired by and conforming to many formal characteristics of the traditional musical accompaniment to the dance of same name.
( music ) A movement which is part of a longer musical composition such as a suite , sonata , or symphony which is inspired by and conforming to formal characteristics of the dance of same name.
